Material used.Description: CHO cells were cultured in Dulbecco-modified Eagle medium (DMEM) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum, 100 U/mL penicillin and 100 Âµg/mL streptomycin.

Readout description.Result Description: L10P DJ-1 showed reduced protein stability and solubility, and formed inclusions following proteasome inhibition.
P158DEL DJ-1 showed reduced protein stability and solubility, and formed inclusions following proteasome inhibition.
L166P DJ-1 showed dramatically reduced protein stability and solubility, and formed inclusions following proteasome inhibition.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated at least 3 times and similar results were obtained.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: WT DJ-1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Mock vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Statistical analyses were performed using GraphPad Prism 5.0.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels similar to WT DJ-1.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Reduced protein stability and solubility, and formation of inclusions following proteasome inhibition.
